wiki.content: "Family Portrait" is a pop/hip-hop song written by P!nk and Scott Storch for P!nk's second album M!ssundaztood (2001). The song is about her family that was about to fall to pieces, portraying the conflict through the eyes of her as a child. It was released as the album's fourth and final single in December 2002. It peaked at number twenty on the U.S. Billboard Hot 100 and number eleven on the UK Singles Chart. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: "Family Portrait" is a pop/hip-hop song written by P!nk and Scott Storch for P!nk's second album M!ssundaztood (2001). The song is about her family that was about to fall to pieces, portraying the conflict through the eyes of her as a child. It was released as the album's fourth and final single in December 2002. It peaked at number twenty on the U.S. Billboard Hot 100 and number eleven on the UK Singles Chart.
